binding:binding.name: Nest Binding
binding:binding.description: Monitor and control Nest Learning Thermostats, Nest Protect Smoke+CO detectors, and Nest Cams using the cloud-based API.
binding:binding.author: John Cocula

parameter.name: client_id
parameter.label: Nest Product ID needed to use the Nest API.

parameter.name: client_secret
parameter.label: Nest Product Secret needed to use the Nest API.

parameter.name: pin_code
parameter.label: PIN code that Nest presented when you authorized this client.
